name: Cracked: A Soft Boiled Breakfast Mystery
name_original: Cracked: A Soft Boiled Breakfast Mystery
description:
Hue Vos is a soft boiled egg with dreams of being a skydiver. When a meetup with his mentor Dante the Donut goes awry, Hue is thrown into the flames of a dangerous mystery.

Follow the breadcrumbs and solve the case in this breakfast themed point and click adventure. One thing’s for sure - in this corruption fueled kitchen city, breakfast always clings to the past.

This game was made for the Buddy Up Winter 2023 Jam.
